summary.title: Summary
summary.paragraph: Full Stack Developer with solid experience in designing, optimizing and deploying websites and applications. Expertise in Javascript technologies and associated frameworks. Ability to work in demanding environments and collaborate effectively with multidisciplinary teams.

tasks.name: Reduced development environment setup time by 50% through standardization with Docker.
Implemented a robust API architecture as modules (libraries), reducing and enhancing integration with different client applications.
Increased unit test coverage with Jest, ensuring reliability and reducing production bugs.
Actively utilized Jira to enhance agile management, reducing development task delivery times by 20%.
Developed a mobile application for a logistics company, enhancing the management of machines and reducing maintenance costs by 25%.
Designed a custom back-office solution for centralized data management and optimizing operational processes.
Resolved customer and supplier disputes, achieving a 70% resolution rate and reducing escalations by 20%.
Improved customer communication via phone and Zendesk, increasing satisfaction by 30% and cutting response time by 25%.
Trained colleagues on handling tasks, boosting team efficiency and reducing errors.
Graduated top of the class, ranking 1st out of 40.
Provided assistance in emergency situations, such as public disorder.
Participated in Operation Sentinelle, contributing to national security.

skills.title: Adaptability
skills.description: Adjust to new challenges and changes

skills.title: Collaborate
skills.description: Work well in a team environment
